bean.description: Data object to represent extract from JnjReadDashboard table.
Data object to represent extract from JnjWriteDashboard table.

property.name: signature
property.description: This property is used to set the signature media model value to data.

property.name: materialNumber
property.description: Corresponds to the product code for which product exists in other external systems but not in Hybris.

property.name: materialEntered
property.description: Corresponds to the code to be displayed in replacement of 'materialNumber'.

property.name: shippingTrackingInfo
property.description: The Map holds order entry id as its key and list of Shipping Tracking Info as value which contains tracking id, ship date and tracking url

property.name: ghxUrl
property.description: The GHX-E static link url to view all invoice(s).

property.name: showCreditHold
property.description: This flag is used to determine whether to show a credit hold message after an order is placed.

property.name: orderOnPAHold
property.description: This flag is used to determine whether an order is on PA hold.

property.name: signature
property.description: This property is used to set the signature media model value to data.

property.name: signature
property.description: This property is used to set the signature media model value to data.

property.name: productCode
property.description: Product Code contains the Catalog ID of the Product.
